Html:
I just started working with this class, but I had several problems, or better yet, I needed to perform several actions which the developer documentation.doc didnt have a topic.
For example, I wanted to know how many rows does my excel sheet have. I found the solutions in this message board, but there has to be a complete list with all functions.
Does anybody know?

Regards

Take a look at this thread:
http://www.codeplex.com/PHPExcel/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=30931
